--- title: netdata-pandas keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "A helper library to pull data from netdata api into a pandas dataframe." description: "A helper library to pull data from netdata api into a pandas dataframe." ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Install

pip install netdata-pandas

Documentation

More detailed documentation can be found at https://netdata.github.io/netdata-pandas

Quickstart

Get some data into a pandas dataframe.

{% raw %} 
from netdata_pandas.data import get_data

df = get_data('london.my-netdata.io', ['system.cpu','system.load','system.ram'], after=-60, before=0)
print(df.shape)
print(df.head())

(60, 16)

Examples

You can find some more examples in the examples folder.

Or if you just want to play with it right now you can use this Google Colab notebook to quickly get started.
